import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (

Welcome to Tech Concepts Demo

Hello, {user?.name}! This project demonstrates various React concepts.

📋 Tasks Management

CRUD operations using useReducer and localStorage persistence

Go to Tasks

📝 Notes App

Optimized rendering with useMemo and useCallback

Go to Notes

📚 Resources

Lazy loaded component with Suspense

Go to Resources

👤 Profile

User profile management with Context API

Go to Profile

Technologies Covered

React Router: Multi-page navigation
Context API: Auth & Theme management
useReducer: Complex state management
useEffect + LocalStorage: Data persistence
useMemo + useCallback: Performance optimization
Lazy Loading: Code splitting with Suspense
Custom Hooks: useLocalStorage implementation
); }; export default Home;
